description: Overseeing daily logistics, supply chain, and fleet management to ensure safe, cost-effective, and on-time delivery. They drive strategic planning, negotiate carrier contracts, and implement technologies to optimize performance. Key responsibilities include optimizing transportation networks, managing budgets, and ensuring compliance

Responsible for the strategic direction and daily operations of the transportation and distribution network. They work closely with executive leadership to align logistics with business goals, managing teams, technology, and vendors to ensure timely, cost-effective delivery of goods

Daily, on-the-floor activities to ensure efficient, safe, and timely movement of goods. Key responsibilities include scheduling drivers, coordinating dispatch, managing warehouse inventory, maintaining compliance with safety regulations, training personnel, and resolving logistical disruption
